summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a casual meeting. The email highlights Epstein's informal communication style and includes a note about confidentiality and legal disclaimers from JPMorgan Chase.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a casual invitation to Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, engaged in a casual conversation with Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are communicating informally, suggesting a personal relationship.

keyFacts: The email was sent by Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley.
Epstein invited Staley to come over, indicating a casual meeting.
The email contains a note about confidentiality and legal disclaimers from JPMorgan Chase.
Epstein apologized for typos in the email, suggesting a casual tone.
The email was sent from Epstein's iPhone.
